Skill.label: 6l Toxic Rain without Empower Life Based
1l Low Level Clarity OR Withering Step OR Portal

PathOfBuilding.Notes:
This build and all the notes are made by Play Like Jay Twitch: https://www.twitch.tv/play_like_jay Build Guide Video on YouTube: https://youtu.be/LbL7A6lakgQ Link for updated PoB: https://pastebin.com/KHDty33K Install the PoB Community Fork for a more detailed PoB Experience! https://youtu.be/UPGs1jkHatE
!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! !!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!---PASSIVE PROGRESSION TREES CAN BE SELECTED IN "TREE" SECTION FROM THE BOTTOM LEFT DROP DOWN MENU---!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! !!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
BANDIT: Kill All for 2 Passives
ASCENDANCY: In Passive Tree Progression Parts
PANTHEON: Major: Lunaris in Maps, Solaris for Bosses (Brine King if you have problems getting stunned too often) Minor: Garukhan for Evasion and Movement Speed (my go to), Abberath if you do not want to use an Ignite Immunity Flask, Tukohama for cocky Facetanking
Most Important GEAR WHEN PROGRESSING from Start to End in maps: Ignore Socket Colors on my Gear - ALWAYS GET COLORS DEPENDING ON THE GEMS YOU WANT TO PUT IN THERE!!! - Put your 4-links wherever you can get the color setups the easiest! 1. Fix your mana issues (and pick up energy shield items and keep the best ones - the best bases are: Hubris Circlet, Vaal Regalia, Sorcerer Gloves, Sorcerer Boots) 2. Get at least a Life Flask, Quicksilver Flask and another utility flask and try to get at least Bleed and Freeze Immunity 3. Two Options: #1: This is what I suggest: 6l Short Bow (or gather The Porcupine Div Cards and exchange them) and throw a Shrieking Essence of Dread on there (Toxic Rain goes into the bow) #2: Get a Bow with a few nice rolls (or get Quill Rain) and a Tabula (Toxic Rain goes into the Tabula) 4. Make the swap to pure Energy Shield with CI (you might need additional Orb of Regret depending on your level) - there are two items that are usually cheap but offer a lot of ES: Soul Strike (Quiver) and Sin Trek (Boots) Those items will greatly help you to get above 4k Energy Shield (4k is my personal value at which I like to start going CI) once you swapped the passive tree. Don't forget to cap out your resistances and get enough Attributes! You can simulate your build by creating a new PoB, import the gear you might want to use and manually add the passive tree for your level. 5. Finish to set up your flasks if you haven't done so yet. 6. Improve your gear until you feel comfortable with your current ES pool and you are more than capped in resistances (Thread of Hope will lower your resistances, changing Boots might help with that) 7. Get Cluster Jewels and change the passive tree accordingly. 8. Get the other jewels (Energy from Within, Thread of Hope - be cautious since this one lowers your resistances so you might need new gear!) 9. Re-evaluate your mana and decide on how to fix those issues for your endgame character (important when buying a Watcher's Eye) 9. The next two things are most likely quite expensive: get a new Bow and a Watcher's Eye 10. Upgrade all items depending on your needs.
If you have (and you will have) MANA ISSUES: Option #1: Mana Flask (best base is Eternal) with the Enduring Mod Option #2: Removing an Aura to get a high level Clarity instead Option #3: Non-Channelling Skills have -X to Total Mana Cost craft on Rings/Amulet Option #4: low level Clarity + Watcher's Eye Jewel with the Mod Non-Channelling Skills have -X to Total Mana Cost while affected by Clarity Option #5: A LOT of Mana Rolls on Gear including Jewels Option #6: Changes to the Passive Tree (or Anointment) for more Mana, Mana Regen, less Mana Cost Option #7: A combination of 2 or more things mentioned above. Here's what I did: Early Build Progression Opt #1 + #2: Mana Flask + High leveled Clarity instead of Malevolence (lost quite some damage because of no Malevolence but you make up for this if you are able to spam Toxic Rain without mana issues) With better Gear and more Currency Opt #3 + #4: with 2 -X Mana Crafts and a Clarity Watcher's Eye (also works with 3 -X Mana Crafts instead of Watcher's Eye, but in my case I would've lost my ES roll on my amulet for this)
ENERGY SHIELD MECHANICS: Both ES Recharge and ES Regen are affected by ES Recovery mods. ES Recharge: After a short delay (2s base) after taking damage, your Energy Shield begins recharging (base 20% per second). Example: With 200% faster start of recharge and 50% increased recharge rate you will recharge 30% (20% base * 1.5) of maximum energy shield per second after not taking damage for at least 0.67 seconds (2s base / 3). With 10% increased ES Recovery, this increases to 33% after not taking damage for 0.67 seconds. On top of that you can have ES Regen. ES Regeneration: A regeneration effect that is always active no matter if you've taken damage or not. Example: You have 100 Flat Energy Shield Regen from your items and passive tree and 60% increased energy shield regen. You end up with 160 Energy Shield Regen per Second. With 10% increased ES Recovery, this increases to 176 Energy Shield Regen per Second. This build focuses only on recharge!
ENCHANTS (none of them is necessary but nice to have): Helm: Toxic Rain fires 1 Additional Arrow OR Toxic Rain deals 40% increased Damage (or Malevolence Mana Reservation if you encounter big mana issues) Gloves: Reflection Boots: Movement Speed, Attack/Cast Speed
ANOINTMENT: Early Game: Freedom of Movement for Phasing, Movement Speed and Dodge Endgame: Exceptional Perfomance for Huge Damage against Bosses OR Growth and Decay for more reliable Damage against all Targets (a lot more expensive!) Defense: Anything with Energy Shield, Energy Shield Recharge, Evasion, Dodge, Movement Speed (example: Wisdom of the Glade, Sanctity, Unnatural Calm) Mana: Dreamer OR Aligned Spirits OR Battle Rouse (or any other nice mana node to your liking)
RARE GEAR: 1. Cap Resistances, get necessary Attributes (114 STR, 159 DEX for lvl 21 gems) and a lot of Energy Shield (Intelligence is also an ES boost) - also Movement Speed on Boots 2. Evasion (if you have pure ES bases then stay with those) or Damage rolls like Attack Speed, (Chaos) DoT, +1 to Int/Chaos Gems on Amulet, Area of Effect
JEWELS: Energy Shield, Attack Speed, Chaos DoT Multi, Damage over Time, Chaos Damage, or maybe Mana / Attributes / Resistance if necessary If Phasing / Onslaught not from Flask or Anoint - get it on an Abyss Jewel (you can put Abyss Jewels in normal Jewel Sockets on the Passive Tree)
CLUSTER JEWEL NOTABLES - Number is approx Damage % improve NOT ALL VIABLE NOTABLES ARE LISTED HERE! Also note that the build works absolutely fine without Cluster Jewels!!! 5% Chaos Damage over Time Multi - 2.2 Unholy Grace (lrg) - 9 (Attack and Cast Speed) Touch of Cruelty (lrg) - 5.3 (Hinder, decreasing enemy movement speed) Unwaveringly Evil (lrg) - 4.2 (better Stun Resistance) Wicked Pall (lrg/med) - 10 (max power against strong enemies) Eternal Suffering (med) - 3.6 (easy low amount of Withered stacks) Eldritch Inspirtation (med) - 3.6 (Mana) Vile Reinvigoration (med) - 3.5 (ES + ES Regen) Brush with Death (med/sml) - 4.5 (ES/Life Recovery on Kill) Defensive Small Keystones: Energy from Naught (Flat ES), Spring Back (% ES, faster start and increased ES Recharge)
WATCHER'S EYE: Many interesting rolls, so choose whatever you feel like might be necessary for you (I recommend calculating the best Watcher's Eye you can afford in PoB before you buy it!). Clarity: Non-Channelling Skills have (-5 - -10) to Total Mana Cost while affected by Clarity (if you have mana issues) Gain (12-18)% of Maximum Mana as Extra Maximum Energy Shield while affected by Clarity (can be a nice boost to total Energy Shield, but usually extremely expensive) Discipline: (30-40)% faster start of Energy Shield Recharge while affected by Discipline (very valueable against bosses) (20-30)% increased Energy Shield Recovery Rate while affected by Discipline (very valueable against bosses) Malevolence: +(18-22)% Damage over Time Multiplier while affected by Malevolence (Damage) (15-20)% increased Recovery rate of Life and Energy Shield while affected by Malevolence (like the Discipline one, but worse) (20-30)% increased Skill Effect Duration while affected by Malevolence (Damage that is only in effect against bosses)
LEVELING at League Start: (G-green socket, R-red socket, B-blue socket --- also, if no lvl given behind support gem it means this support is below the active skill lvl requirement) 1-11 - with Bow and Caustic Arrow (keep in mind that you will need a bow once you want to use Toxic Rain at lvl 12) G Caustic Arrow (Vendor) - All G Links G Mirage Archer (lvl 4 - Vendor) G Volley (lvl 4 - Quest Reward) and swap for G Lesser Multiple Projectiles (lvl 8 - Quest Reward) G Void Manipulation (lvl 8 - Quest Reward) - Use Void Manipulation instead of Lesser Multiple Projectiles if you need more damage against the early bosses
1-11 - with Claws/Daggers and Cobra Lash (keep in mind that you will need a bow once you want to use Toxic Rain at lvl 12) G Cobra Lash (Quest Reward) - All G Links G Lesser Poison (Vendor) G Volley Support (lvl 4 - Quest Reward) and swap for G Lesser Multiple Projectiles (lvl 8 - Quest Reward) G Void Manipulation (lvl 8 - Quest Reward) - Use Void Manipulation instead of Lesser Multiple Projectiles if you need more damage against the early bosses
12+ G Toxic Rain 3 to 6 link (gems are sorted by importance - chose whatever early 3-6l colors and attributes you get early on) G Mirage Archer G Void Manipulation G Swift Affliction (lvl 31 - Quest Reward Library Siosa Quest in Act 3) B Efficacy (lvl 31 - Vendor after Library Siosa Quest in Act 3) G Vicious Projectiles (lvl 18 - Vendor after Library Siosa Quest in Act 3) G Slower Projectiles (lvl 31 - Vendor after Library Siosa Quest in Act 3) B Increased Area of Effect (lvl 38 - Quest Reward) R Increased Duration (lvl 31 - Vendor after Library Siosa Quest in Act 3) Best 4 Link 4G: Mirage Archer + Void Manipulation + Swift Affliction ----- This is the best of all the listed 4 links Best 4 Link 3G 1B: Mirage Archer + Void Manipulation + Efficacy Best 5 Link 5G: Mirage Archer + Void Manipulation + Swift Affliction + Vicious Projectiles Best 5 Link 4G 1B: Mirage Archer + Void Manipulation + Swift Affliction + Efficacy ----- This is the best of all the listed 5 links Best 6 Link 5G 1B: Mirage Archer + Void Manipulation + Swift Affliction + Efficacy + Vicious Projectiles
